title: Smart Data Models - SetPoint
description: Adapted from CIM data models. An analog control that issue a set point value.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be SetPoint

normalValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Normal value for Control.value e.g. used for percentage scaling. Default: 0.0

value.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The value representing the actuator output. Default: 0.0
